column1: 821711,Construction Rigger,,"Attach rigging to objects so they can be moved
column3: Communicate with co-workers to coordinate installations or repairs
column5: Operate cranes, hoists or other moving or lifting equipment
column7: Move and store materials, equipment or products
column11: Determine types of equipment, tools, or materials needed for jobs
column13: Test mechanical systems to ensure proper functioning
column19: Clean or repair equipment, parts or tools
